title: Services — INTOMESEA
description: Explore IntoMeSea's selection of wellness services.
cleaned_text: Crystal Wave Water Healing Ceremony IntoMeSea is excited to announce an exclusive service co-created with resident energy healer, Nicoracle! Nicole's ceremonies include breathwork, sound therapy, emotional release, energy clearing and somatic healing, all while soaking in Pachamama, our beautiful Galactic Crystal Intention Tub. Availability is limited, must be paid for in advance and booked only through contacting [martha@intomesea.com.](mailto:martha@intomesea.com) Monday, Wednesday, Friday 12 - 2:30 pm & 5:25 - 8:05 pm Saturdays 12 - 2:30 pm Sundays 4:30 - 7 pm
